Package com.warzone.team08.VM.map_editor.services

Class EditMapService

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.team08.VM.map_editor.services.EditMapService
All Implemented Interfaces:
SingleCommand
public class EditMapService
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleCommand
This file loads map file in the user console.

This service handles `editmap` user command.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EditMapService()
    Initializes variables required to load map into different objects.

  • Method Details

    • handleLoadMap

      public java.lang.String handleLoadMap​(java.lang.String p_filePath, boolean shouldCreateNew) throws InvalidMapException, AbsentTagException, ResourceNotFoundException, InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      This method reads user provided map file. It reads data from file and stores into different java objects.
      Parameters:
      p_filePath - Path of the file to be read.
      shouldCreateNew - True if this method should create a new file if it doesn't exists.
      Returns:
      Value of the response.
      Throws:
      InvalidMapException - Throws if file does not have valid map data.
      AbsentTagException - Throws if there is missing tag.
      ResourceNotFoundException - Throws if file not found.
      InvalidInputException - Throws if type cast was not successful.
      EntityNotFoundException - Throws if the referred entity is not found.

    • handleLoadMap

      public java.lang.String handleLoadMap​(java.lang.String p_filePath) throws AbsentTagException, InvalidMapException, ResourceNotFoundException, InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      The overloading method of handleLoadMap(String, boolean) This overloading method calls the overloaded method with a variable indicating that create a new file if it doesn't exists.
      Parameters:
      p_filePath - Path of the file to be read.
      Returns:
      Value of the response.
      Throws:
      InvalidMapException - Throws if file does not have valid map data.
      AbsentTagException - Throws if there is missing tag.
      ResourceNotFoundException - Throws if file not found.
      InvalidInputException - Throws if type cast was not successful.
      EntityNotFoundException - Throws if the referred entity is not found.

    • getModelComponents

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getModelComponents​(java.lang.String p_line)
      Extracts the model components from the line.
      Parameters:
      p_line - Line to be interpreted.
      Returns:
      Value of the list of components.

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> p_commandValues) throws InvalidMapException, ResourceNotFoundException, InvalidInputException, AbsentTagException, EntityNotFoundException
      Takes the command and executes the function.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface SingleCommand
      Parameters:
      p_commandValues - Represents the values passed while running the command.
      Returns:
      Value of string acknowledging user that the file is loaded or not.
      Throws:
      InvalidMapException - Throws if the map was not valid.
      ResourceNotFoundException - Throws if file not found.
      InvalidInputException - Throws if the user command is invalid.
      AbsentTagException - Throws if any tag is missing in map file.
      EntityNotFoundException - Throws if entity is missing.
      See Also:
      handleLoadMap(java.lang.String, boolean)
